```{julia, Dot4-vis, Dot_title="mandelbrot"}
function mandelbrot(a)
    z = 0
    for i=1:50
        z = z^2 + a
    end
    return z
end

for y=1.0:-0.05:-1.0
    for x=-2.0:0.0315:0.5
        abs(mandelbrot(complex(x, y))) < 2 ? print("*") : print(" ")
    end
    println()
end

# Taken from: https://rosettacode.org/wiki/Mandelbrot_set#Julia
```
